data.name: Stallion Squad
data.detailed_description:
Embark on an adventure in the open worlds of Stallion Squad. Group up with friends or go solo in your own procedurally generated worlds. Venture out, gather resources, find treasure, fight powerful creatures, dress up, open a farm and build your own base! The possibilites are endless in this action-packed RPG where you create your own stories.

Stallion Squad throws you into an exciting adventure and you can expect fun activites all around the year with seasonal events and content updates! Right out of the package you get two different gamemodes, each with their own twist! Survival is all about exploring and surviving. Creative lets you create your own maps which you can share with friends! Stallion Squad is waiting for you, what will you do next?


● Multiplayer - Go solo or take your steam friends with you! It's up to you!
● Exploration - Explore the mountains or go undersea, the world is for exploring!
● Crafting - Gather resources and craft them into furniture, clothing and weapons!
● Farming - Plant, grow and harvest different types of seeds for food!
● Building - Create your own homebase, decorate and upgrade it!
● Seasons - Each time of the year brings festivities to Stallion Squad!

data.short_description: Stallion Squad has exciting and vibrant worlds for you to explore. Gather resources, battle powerful creatures and build your own campsite. Group up with friends or go solo, it's up to you!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
